articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets fall as investors assess Moody's U.S. downgrade, China data - CNBC
articles.description: With this downgrade, Moody's has joined the ranks of other major rating agencies. S&P made the first move in 2011, and Fitch followed suit in 2023.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets fell Monday as investors assess the latest slate of economic data from China and Moody's downgrade of the U.S. credit rating.
